name: Forte Research Group
overview:
The Forte Research Group is a custom research consultancy specializing in the effectiveness of advertising, packaging, web site and brand communications

We are creative problem solvers with deep experience in research, marketing and branding. Our fundamental objective is to provide research-based consultancy, offering not just data, but conclusions/implications to lead to understanding. Additionally, we provide recommendations to improve the effectiveness of the excution and learning for future campaigns.

Our team stems from the top marketing research suppliers. It was this varied experience that created the Forte Research Group to fill the void in marketing research.

> Deep expertise in and commitment to excellence - Each Client Service Director holds at least 10 years experience within the market research field and oversees each project from start to finish.

> Innovative technologies - Developed through experiences, our technologies allow for deeper insight of consumer choice.

>Our reach is global - With locations in New York and London, and partners throughout the world, our team is ready to service your needs.
